name: ARSTechnica NoWhite
description: NoWhite: Removes white and replaces with a color of your choice.

user.name: gmyx
user.about:
Most of my skins are for eliminating (as much as possible) white from web sites. White tires my eyes and I use these to repalce them on my most used website. 

I am open to web site suggestions.

additional_info:
Version 1.0: Initial Release
Version 1.1: Corrected transprency on main article titles spanning multiple lines
Version 1.2: Added block quote to list of items needs new color - added a preference for the border color of blockquote
